Room.Name: Harvest Circle
Room.ShortDescription: You are casually walking along the southern rim of the Harvest Circle.
Room.LongDescription: The Harvest Circle is a magnificent structure built to celebrate the end of the year's harvest and thoughts for the next year. To the south, Necropolis Avenue runs towards the Necropolis, surrounded on both sides by the Bushman Plantation and Farms, where much of the fruits and vegetables are grown.
